name: Call Of Pixel: Close Quarters
description:
PVP Free for All with PVE.

Current contents:

1 Map in 2 Sizes and 2 Mods, 2 Tools for 2 Dedicated Servers on 2 Free DLC.
3 Class, 5 Ranks, 3 Weapons, 5 Equipements, +15 Skins & 1 Cosmetics

7 others cosmetics in "DLC - Cosmetics Pack" for support game development.

You can Host or Join the servers.
Please if you host a server indicate your regions (EU, US...).

You can host with the client but for the moment you will need to use the "DLC - Public Server" or "DLC - Zombies Public Server" and the "Tool" of the Game Server if you want to host a dedicated server with ammunation and cycle day and night with zombies or not according to the chosen DLC.

Please indicate your region and mention that it is about a "Standard" or "Zombies" Server.

As with the demolition, but in much more restrictive conditions, the "Zombies" are not fully integrated at the moment. If you're playing on "Zombie Public Server", try starting a game with other players before zombies appear with the Dedicated Server Tool, because the player who will join the game or leave to return will not be synchronized with IA & demolition.(server windows can be reduced or resize)

Currently weapons equipment is not visible to other players.

Help the game with Youtube, Twitch or everything you want
And report a bug or cheater.

Future Contents:

More maps, ranks, weapons & cosmetics.
